Question: Singer/actress Cher says that she dated this person in 1985.
Hints: This person had a relationship with Risky Business co-star Rebecca De Mornay from 1983 to 1985.
This person replaced her with his sister, fellow Scientologist Lee Anne DeVette, who served in that role until November 2005.
This person followed up Top Gun with The Color of Money, which came out the same year, and which paired him with Paul Newman.
